group_1.narration: I heard that a cafe Yachiyo frequents@opened a new store near Mikazuki Villa.
Today is their opening day,@so we all decided to go.

group_1.textRight: Iroha, I heard this cafe...@[chara:100301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.5][chara:100301:cheek_0][chara:100301:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:100301:lipSynch_1]might even be a tapioca shop!

group_1.textLeft: Tapi...oca...?

group_1.textRight: Ah, Sis, tapioca is this kind of...

group_1.textLeft: Here we are. It's about to open soon.

group_1.textRight: [chara:100301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...Wait, this is CoCoIchi!
A cafe...?

group_1.textLeft: What did you just say?
You do know of the founding roots of@Curry House CoCo Ichibanya, don't you?
The curry at the coffee shop the founder opened@became popular,
and thus became a curry shop.@Also...
...Basically, it's a highly respected cafe.

group_1.textRight: Exactly what Master said.

group_1.textCenter: H-huh...?@Yachiyo, do you have a passion for curry...?
I know that you're really into Japanese food, but...

group_1.textRight: Mm? Well, she does love Japanese food in particular,@but she loves everything regardless.

group_1.textLeft: I can hear you over there!
Also, Japanese curry has evolved into its own,@so to speak, Japanese dish...

group_1.textRight: Well, I don't mind it all since we're gettin' grub@so early though.
Ah, but I suck at eatin' curry...
Every friggin time I run outta curry sauce first@and end up with too much rice...

group_1.textLeft: A common tragedy for lovers of strong flavors.
By the way Felicia, are you able to eat tonkatsu@with rice?

group_1.textRight: What're you sayin' all a sudden, 'course I can eat it.

group_1.textLeft: And hamburg steak with rice?

group_1.textRight: I just told you I can eat!@Ain't it obvious?!

group_1.textLeft: Then why not just ask?
Take a look at this outside menu!
And take it all in!@These abundant toppings!

group_1.textRight: [chara:100501:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Woaaah! Amazin'!@All of these look so good!

group_1.textLeft: After all, CoCoIchi's greatest feature is@its abundance of toppings.
While the toppings are normally to enhance@the flavor of the curry...
You can use them to save the meal when your@curry sauce is gone.

group_1.textRight: I ain't afraid of curry anymore!
But there really are a lot, aren't there?
I'd like to complete the entire menu some day.

group_1.textLeft: Complete...?
Ui, what you just said was a careless mistake.

group_1.textRight: W-why...?

group_1.textLeft: At CoCoIchi, you can order many toppings@all at once.

group_1.textRight: Eh?! A bunch of toppings at the same time?!

group_1.textLeft: Thus, every topping combination is like@its own menu item!
And since they currently have about 40 types@of toppings...

group_1.textRight: A-awawa...

group_1.textLeft: If you were planning on@"completing the entire menu"...
For an elementary student such as yourself, Ui,@the math gets a bit complicated,
but there is this thing called@calculating combinations...

group_1.textRight: Ah, so it's a number you can't even count...?

group_1.textLeft: Well, you could say that.

group_1.textRight: But just finding out what your tastes are@sounds fun.

group_1.textLeft: How about you, Iroha?@Do you have a favorite topping?

group_1.textRight: I like...mild flavor with cheese in my curry.
I ask for it all the time at CoCoIchi.

group_1.textLeft: Then the double cheese, I take it?

group_1.textRight: Doub...? W-what is that?

group_1.textLeft: It seems you really don't know...@[chara:100201:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:100201:lipSynch_1]The freedom of combining toppings.
That means that it's also possible to combine@the same topping.

group_1.textRight: So what you call "double cheese" is...

group_1.textLeft: Yes, curry with cheese as your topping...
With more cheese toppings!!

group_1.textRight: S-such a thing is possible?!

group_1.textLeft: That's right, a light hotness...@Eight spices curry with double cheese...
That was truly wonderful.

group_1.textRight: Guu...I want to eat...@Hurry and open...

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle*...

group_1.textRight: Hey, Master.

group_1.textLeft: What's the matter? Did you have something@to ask too, Tsuruno?

group_1.textRight: You've been showing off your knowledge@of CoCoIchi for some time now,
but as a restaurant girl myself I can't lose.

group_1.textLeft: Heeh...

group_1.textRight: There's something you squandered in your speech@just now.

group_1.textLeft: Wha! That can't be...

group_1.textRight: It is true that CoCoIchi will up the spiciness@for every 20 yen you pay.
But you know, there's a free way to make it spicier.@An item called Tobikara Spice...

group_1.textLeft: No, I did know that.
But you see, curry is cooking with the spice...
...to create the umami and aroma.
Tobikara spice is a fine item for last minute@adjustments,
but for the umami and aroma, I will gladly@spare 20 yen.

group_1.textRight: I concede.
Even a savvy saver like Yachiyo would dare to go@that far...

group_1.textLeft: How about you, Sana?@Is there anything you want to know?

group_1.textRight: Ah...umm, you see...

group_1.textLeft: Can you handle everything?@Anything you have trouble eating?

group_1.textRight: Ah, I'm invisible, so the employees not being able@to see me is a problem...

group_1.textLeft: That certainly is...
A-at CoCoIchi...
There are no rude staff members who would@ignore a customer, so rest assured...

group_1.textRight: Idealism!
I'm sorry, Sana, but customer service regulations@like that would be too harsh!
Ah— the store's door...@It's not opening time yet, but...

group_1.textLeft: I'm sure they're just opening early.@Oh, I can't wait.

group_1.textCenter: We will not be open today.

group_1.textLeft: It may be sudden, but here's@the Lucky Topping Corner!
We will be introducing various CoCoIchi toppings@here every time.
And after that, we will announce the lucky forecast@of the day!

group_1.textRight: A brilliant plan.

group_1.textLeft: Today's topping is...
Cheese!

group_1.textRight: A surefire winner that's always delicious.@It will upgrade any curry.
It will make your curry more mild,@so it's recommended for little children.

group_1.textLeft: Okay, and here's the fortune!@If you put cheese toppings on your curry...
Scoldings from your scary senpai will be@more mild...maybe!

group_1.textRight: So if you're expecting someone to scold you about@something today, head on down to CoCoIchi!

group_1.textLeft: Up next is the Login Bonus Corner!
